entities: Committee established pursuant to paragraph 3 (a) of resolution 1591 (2005)
reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide a midterm briefing by 31 July 2013, and a final report no later than 30 days prior to termination of its mandate
summary:
14. Expresses concern that not all Member States implement travel ban and asset freeze on designated individuals, requests the Committee to address non-compliance, engaging with relevant parties.

15. Intends to review implementation state, including obstacles, of measures imposed in resolutions 1591 (2005) and 1945 (2010) after the midterm report.

16. Reaffirms the Committee's mandate to encourage dialogue with interested Member States, inviting representatives to discuss implementation, and encourages continued dialogue with UNAMID.

17. Welcomes the Committee's work highlighting private sector actors' responsibilities in conflict-affected areas, drawing on Panel of Experts' reports and other forums.

18. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
